metadata.title: Land price diffusion across borders – the case of Germany
metadata.publisher: Informa UK Limited, trading as Taylor & Francis Group

data_sources.source_name: Oberer Gutachterausschuss für Grundstückswerte in Niedersachsen and Gutachterausschuss für Grundstückswerte in Sachsen-Anhalt
data_sources.description: The dataset includes sale transactions of arable land between 1994 and 2015 in Lower Saxony and Saxony-Anhalt. It contains information on the price, size, soil quality, and location of sold plots. The data was used to analyze the spatial integration of land markets across the former East and West Germany border.
data_sources.access_conditions: Data provided by Oberer Gutachterausschuss für Grundstückswerte in Niedersachsen and Gutachterausschuss für Grundstückswerte in Sachsen-Anhalt

assessment.findability_reason: The data is not publicly available and requires access through specific German institutions.
assessment.accessibility_reason: Access is restricted and likely requires permission from the data providers.
assessment.interoperability_reason: The data format and standards are not specified, limiting interoperability.
assessment.reusability_reason: Reusability is limited due to restricted access and unspecified data format and standards.
